articles.author: Daniel Murphy
articles.title: Manchester United and Man City suffer same fate in European final failures, but a solution is coming - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Both Manchester City and Man United lost European finals they were favourites to win this week.
articles.content:
It was supposed to be so different.
With both of the city's clubs in European finals eyes had already turned to an all-Manchester UEFA Super Cup. What an occasion that would be.
And why not dream?… [+4542 chars]

articles.author: Brian Hutton, Marie O'Halloran
articles.title: Poots accuses EU of using Northern Ireland ‘as a plaything’ - The Irish Times
articles.description: European Commission currently ‘don’t seem to care for the peace process’, says DUP leader
articles.content:
DUP leader Edwin Poots has accused the EU for using Northern Ireland as a plaything over Brexit.
He also accused the EU of doing demonstrable harm to the peace process and said he is concerned of vi… [+1335 chars]
